G

GameResult - Class in pente
A GameResult stores the win/loss totals of an individual player.
GameResult(Player, int, int) - Constructor for class pente.GameResult
Creates a new GameResult for the given Player.
getCaptureWins() - Method in class pente.GameResult
Returns the number of wins by capture.
getCellSize() - Method in class pente.GridView
Returns the width of each cell in pixels
getCol() - Method in class pente.GridObject
Returns the column this GridObject is located at.
getCol() - Method in class pente.Location
Returns the column of this Location object.
getColor() - Method in class pente.Player
Returns the Color of this player if this player was constructed by the constructor that uses a Color instead of an image file.
getDropLoc() - Method in class pente.HighlightPanel
Gets the location a user is currently clicking or dragging on where a piece might possibly be dropped.
getFiveInARowWins() - Method in class pente.GameResult
Returns the number of five-in-a-row wins.
getGridLineThickness() - Method in class pente.GridView
Returns the thickness of the grid lines in pixels.
getGridObjectAt(int, int) - Method in class pente.PenteLogic
Returns the GridObject at the given row, column.
getGridView() - Method in class pente.PentePanel
Getter method to access the GridView used by this PentePanel
getID() - Method in class pente.GridObject
Returns the unique ID of this GridObject.
getID() - Method in class pente.Player
Returns the unique player ID for this player.
getImage() - Method in class pente.GridObject
Returns the BufferedImage used by this GridObject.
getImage() - Method in class pente.Player
Returns the BufferedImage for this player.
getName() - Method in class pente.Player
Returns the name of this Player
getNumCols() - Method in class pente.GridView
Returns the number of columns in this GridView
getNumObjects() - Method in class pente.GridView
Returns the number of objects in this grid.
getNumRows() - Method in class pente.GridView
Returns the number of rows in this GridView
getPlayButton() - Method in class pente.PenteGUI
Returns the "Play" button so that ActionListeners outside this class can modify the button properties
getPlayer() - Method in class pente.GameResult
Returns the Player this GameResult keeps statistics for.
getRow() - Method in class pente.GridObject
Returns the row this GridObject is located at.
getRow() - Method in class pente.Location
Returns the row of this Location object.
GridObject - Class in pente
A GridObject is a generalization of any object meant to be displayed as a BufferedImage in any kind of grid or 2D array.
GridObject(int, int, int, BufferedImage) - Constructor for class pente.GridObject
Creates a new GridObject with the given parameters.
GridView - Class in pente
A GridView is a custom JPanel that is displayed as a regular grid of columns and rows, each of which may contain a GridObject.
GridView(int, int, int, Observable) - Constructor for class pente.GridView
Creates a new GridView with the given number of rows, columns.
GridView(int, int, int, int, Observable) - Constructor for class pente.GridView
Creates a new GridView with the given number of rows, columns and grid lines turned on with the given thickness.
